category: Key Phrases - Refer to family members

word: Non, mon père habite en Espagne.
meaning: No, my father lives in Spain.

category: Key Phrases - Refer to family members
Key Phrases - Refer to family members
word: Le mari de Julia est mexicain.

category: Key Phrases - Refer to family members
Key Phrases - Refer to family members

word: Très bien. Merci. Tu as un animal de compagnie
meaning: Very well. Thank you. Do you have a pet?

word: Oui, j'ai un chat. Et toi?
meaning: Yes, I have a cat. And you?

word: Non, mais mon père a un chien.
meaning: No, but my father has a dog.

category: Radio: Paris Garden Chat - Late Nights with Lin
word: Bonjour, je m'appelle Marie. Ma famille habite à Paris.
meaning: Hello, my name is Marie. My family lives in Paris.

category: Radio: Paris Garden Chat - Late Nights with Lin
Radio: Paris Garden Chat - Late Nights with Lin
Radio: Paris Garden Chat - Late Nights with Lin
meaning: I have a garden in Paris.

category: Radio: Paris Garden Chat - Late Nights with Lin
word: Dan le jardin, je joue avec mon animal de compagnie, un chat.
meaning: In the garden, I play with my pet, a cat.

word: Cool! Tu as un chien ou un chat?
meaning: Cool! Do you have a dog or a cat?

word: Non, je n'ai pas de chien et je n'ai pas de chat.
meaning: No, I do not have a dog and I do not have a cat.

word: D'accord. Tu aimes la maison ou l'appartement?
meaning: Okay. Do you like the house or the apartment?

word: Oui, j'aime la maison et aussi l'appartement.
meaning: Yes, I like the house and also the apartment.

word: C'est chouette que tu aimes les duex, maison et appartement.
meaning: It's great that you like both, house and apartment.

word: Nous allons au restaurant mexicain avec ma famille. Tu veux venir?
meaning: We are going to the Mexican restaurant with my family. Do you want to come?

word: Euh... Qui va au restaurant? J'étudie...
meaning: Uh... Who is going to the restaurant? I'm studying...

word: Mon grand-père, ma grand-mère, ma mère, mon père, ma sœur. Et mon cousin.
meaning: My grandfather, my grandmother, my mother, my father, my sister. And my cousin.

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Salut, Lisa. Je vais bien. Merci. Et toi?
meaning: Hello, Lisa. I'm well. Thank you. And you?

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Bien, merci! Ta sœur s'appelle Julia?
meaning: Well, thank you! Is your sister named Julia?

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Non, c'est ma fille qui s'appelle Julia.
meaning: No, it's my daughter whose name is Julia.

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oh d'accord. Ta mère est française?
meaning: Oh okay. Is your mother French?

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: Oui, et mon père habite en Italie.
meaning: Yes, and my father lives in Italy.

category: Radio: Family Origins - Falstaff’s Guide to Humans
word: C'est chouette. Ma famille habite à Paris
meaning: That's cool/nice. My family lives in Paris.

word: J'aime les chiens. Tu aimes les chiens?
meaning: I like dogs. Do you like dogs?

word: Oui, j'aime les chiens beaucoup. Les chiens sont chouettes!
meaning: Yes, I like dogs a lot. Dogs are great!

word: Tu aimes la maison ou l'appartement?
meaning: Do you like the house or the apartment?

word: J'aime la maison et aussi l'appartement.
meaning: I like the house and also the apartment.

word: C'est super, les deux sont chouettes.
Non, je n'ai pas de sœur.
meaning: No, I don't have a sister.

word: D'accord, tu n'ai pas de sœur.
meaning: Okay, you don't have a sister.

word: Ça va. Merci. Où habite ta famille?
meaning: I'm fine. Thank you. Where does your family live?

word: Ma famille habite en France. Et ta sœur?
meaning: My family lives in France. And your sister?
My sister is studying in Italy.

word: Ah chouette! Ton frère va bien?
meaning: Oh great! Is your brother doing well?

word: Oui, mon frère va bien. Merci!
meaning: Yes, my brother is well. Thank you!

word: Où est mon chien bleu, Max?
meaning: Where is my blue dog, Max?

word: Où est le chien bleu de Lily?
Un chien bleu or un chein orange?
meaning: A blue dog or an orange dog?

word: Vous cherchez le chien de Lily?
meaning: Are you looking for Lily's dog?

word: Le chien de Lily est au café.
meaning: Lily's dog is at the cafe.
Your dog is at the cafe!
At the café? Typical... Thank you!

word: Ton fils? Comment s'appelle ton fils?
meaning: Your son? What is your son's name?
My son, Junior... Where is he?
He is here, in the hotel!

word: Salut Papa! C'est mon animal de compagnie, Praline!
meaning: Hello Papa! This is my pet, Praline!

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Tu as un frère ou une sœur?
meaning: Do you have a brother or a sister?

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Je n'ai ni frère ni sœur. Tu es un frère ou une sœur?
meaning: I have neither a brother nor a sister. Are you a brother or a sister?

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Non, je n'ai pas de frère ni de sœor. C'est ennuyeux.
meaning: No, I don't have a brother or sister. It's boring.

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: J'ai une sœur. Elle est... chouette, je suppose
meaning: I have a sister. She's... cool, I guess.

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Ta famille est petite. Tu as un animal de compagnie, alors?
meaning: Your family is small. Do you have a pet, then?

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Non, je n'ai pas d'animal de compagnie. C'est trop de travail. Et toi?
meaning: No, I don't have a pet. It's too much work. And you?

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Oui, ma famille est petite. J'ai un chat. Et toi?
meaning: Yes, my family is small. I have a cat. And you?

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: Non, je n'ai pas d'animal de compagnie. C'est ennuyeux.
meaning: No, I do not have a pet. It is boring.

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: D'accord. Pas d'animal, pas de problème.

category: Roleplay: Discuss your family with a friend
word: D'accord. Les chats sont plus faciles.

meaning: want to come / want to go

word: Salut, je m'appelle Omar. Ma famille habite en France.
meaning: Hello, my name is Omar. My family lives in France.

category: Radio: Brother’s Cat - Lily and Strangers
word: Mon père est français et ma mère est italienne.
meaning: My father is French and my mother is Italian.

category: Radio: Brother’s Cat - Lily and Strangers
word: Elle habite en Italie avec ma grand-mère.
meaning: She lives in Italy with my grandmother.

category: Radio: Brother’s Cat - Lily and Strangers
word: J'ai un frère et une sœur. Mon frère a un animal de compagnie, un chat.
meaning: I have a brother and a sister. My brother has a pet, a cat.
